sentences.english: Both oceanic crust and continental crust type volcanic actions influenced the forming of the Great Ice Age.
sentences.chinese: 洋殼型火山與陸殼型火山共同作用形成大冰期。

sentences.english: Both sea-floor spreading and oceanization may lead to the formation of oceanic crust.
sentences.chinese: 海底擴張和陸殼大洋化，均能形成洋殼。
